reviews.review_msg: Most people thought it was an easy A courseAt, but this is not an easy course. Attendance is mandatory. We need to do a lot of physical work and have to spend lots of our own time for crew call. However, I think he is a nice prof who is trying to teach us all of the skills and important things in theatre.

Most people in class thought it was an easy A course, but no one got A's in the end. Attendance is mandatory. We need to do a lot of physical work & it was so exhausting after every class. However, he seems very tough but he tries to teach us the importance of responsibilities. I think he is a nice prof who shows his tough side to his students.
Very tough grader and not that fair when it comes to his rules.All the same though, very interesting and a good teacher.
